page.title: 02ATTITUDES
page.content: The only local issue of recent months concerned a maggot-breeding enterprise sited on a farm. After neighbours complained of the stench of rotting meat, Chipping Parish Council and Ribble Valley Borough Council refused planning permission and the business, in existence for a few months in 1985,was forced to close down. A recurrent problem for the Barns Fold Fishing Club is poaching;in October,1985,six poachers from Preston were caught and fined Â£500 in total. Their tackle was confiscated.
